Class RemoteTool

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Tool

    public class RemoteTool
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Tool
    This is a Remote Tool implementation for osp data transfers via RMI.
